title: Science Education Competency Enhancement Program Through Collaborative Process Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service/in-service teachers learn collaborative analysis techniques applicable to real science classrooms, conducted self-directedly in asynchronous environments with peer feedback exchanged via online discussion boards.

learning_goals: Learners can identify nonverbal interaction patterns among students in science classes with 80% accuracy.
Learners can visualize group activities using AI-based collaboration analysis tools and propose at least three improvement strategies.
Learners can revise their collaborative guidance strategies at least three times through formative assessments and incorporate them into a final report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
